SEARCH
Package architecture.controller

Class RecordController

java.lang.Object
architecture.controller.RecordController
public class RecordController extends Object
Controller class from MVC architecture that controls Model and View. Defines various functions for handling the coordination between user and storage system.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private EntryView
    entryView
    Instance of EntryView for user interactions for details entry.
    private StudentManager
    model
    Instance of StudentManager for handling business layer.
    private boolean
    saved
    True if the new records are stored into the storage.
    private TableView
    tableView
    Instance of TableView for displaying records.
    private boolean
    updated
    True if the TableView is updated with the records stored previously.

  • Field Details

    • model

      private StudentManager model
      Instance of StudentManager for handling business layer.

    • entryView

      private EntryView entryView
      Instance of EntryView for user interactions for details entry.

    • tableView

      private TableView tableView
      Instance of TableView for displaying records.

    • updated

      private boolean updated
      True if the TableView is updated with the records stored previously.

    • saved

      private boolean saved
      True if the new records are stored into the storage.

  • Constructor Details

    • RecordController

      public RecordController(StudentManager model, EntryView entryView, TableView tableView)
      Constructs MVC model with initial entities. Adds anonymous Actions listeners to the components in the View.
      Parameters:
      model - Model to be handled by the controller.
      entryView - User interactions view to be handled by the controller.
      tableView - Table to be handled by the controller.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Method to start the controller. Sets the visibility of components to true.

    • clearFields

      protected void clearFields()
      Clears the fields of the currently selected Tab.

    • addRecord

      private void addRecord()
      Adds record to StudentManager and to TableView. It will not save the record to storage.

    • initializerCode

      private void initializerCode()
      Initializes the storage with sample records. CAUTION: Use this method only once for the initialization. If multiple times used, same records will be added again.

    • initializeRecordsInFiles

      public void initializeRecordsInFiles()
      Calls initializerCode()

    • getTabName

      private String getTabName()
      Gets name of the Tab that is selected.
      Returns:
      Name of the currently selected Tab.
